member.name: T:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.Adapters.Facebook.FacebookAdapter
member.summary: BotAdapter to allow for handling Facebook App payloads and responses via the Facebook API.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.Adapters.Facebook.FacebookAdapter._facebookClient
member.summary: An instance of the FacebookClientWrapper class.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.Adapters.Facebook.FacebookAdapter.#ctor(Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfiguration,Microsoft.Bot.Builder.Adapters.Facebook.FacebookAdapterOptions,Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using configuration settings.
member.param: An instance.
member.remarks: The adapter uses these configuration keys: - `VerifyToken`, the token to respond to the initial verification request. - `AppSecret`, the secret used to validate incoming webhooks. - `AccessToken`, an access token for the bot.
member.param: An instance of .
The logger this adapter should use.

members.member:
Initializes a new instance of the class using an existing Facebook client.
/// Client used to interact with the Facebook API. Options for the Facebook Adapter. The logger this adapter should use. is null.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.Adapters.Facebook.FacebookAdapter.SendActivitiesAsync(Microsoft.Bot.Builder.ITurnContext,Microsoft.Bot.Schema.Activity[],System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Sends activities to the conversation.
member.param: The context object for the turn.
The activities to send.
A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.returns: A task that represents the work queued to execute.
member.remarks: If the activities are successfully sent, the task result contains an array of objects containing the IDs that the receiving channel assigned to the activities.

The method to call for the resulting bot turn.
A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.returns: A task that represents the work queued to execute.
member.remarks: Call this method to proactively send a message to a conversation.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.Adapters.Facebook.FacebookAdapter.ContinueConversationAsync(System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity,Microsoft.Bot.Schema.ConversationReference,Microsoft.Bot.Builder.BotCallbackHandler,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Sends a proactive message from the bot to a conversation.
member.param: A for the conversation.
A reference to the conversation to continue.
The method to call for the resulting bot turn.
Cancellation token.
member.returns: A task that represents the work queued to execute.
member.remarks:
Call this method to proactively send a message to a conversation.
This method registers the following services for the turn.
(key = "BotIdentity"), a claims claimsIdentity for the bot.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.Adapters.Facebook.FacebookClientWrapperOptions.FacebookApiHost
member.summary: Gets or sets the alternate root URL used to construct calls to Facebook's API. Defaults to "graph.facebook.com" but can be changed (for mocking, proxy, etc).

member.name: P:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.Adapters.Facebook.FacebookClientWrapperOptions.FacebookApiVersion
member.summary: Gets or sets the alternate API version used to construct calls to Facebook's API. Defaults to "v3.2".

member.name: P:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.Adapters.Facebook.FacebookClientWrapperOptions.FacebookVerifyToken
member.summary: Gets or sets the verify token used to initially create and verify the webhooks subscription settings on Facebook's developer portal.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.Adapters.Facebook.FacebookClientWrapperOptions.FacebookAppSecret
member.summary: Gets or sets the app secret from the **Basic Settings** page from your app's configuration in the Facebook developer portal.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.Adapters.Facebook.FacebookClientWrapperOptions.FacebookAccessToken
member.summary: Gets or sets the access token. When bound to a single page, use `access_token` to specify the "page access token" provided in the Facebook developer portal's "Access Tokens" widget of the "Messenger Settings" page.

member.summary: Facebook Quick Reply object that can be sent as part of a Facebook message.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.Adapters.Facebook.FacebookEvents.FacebookQuickReply.ContentType
member.summary: Gets or sets the content type of the reply. Can be: - "text", which sends a text button. - "user_phone_number", which sends a button allowing the recipient to send the phone number associated with their account. - "user_email", which sends a button allowing the recipient to send the email associated with their account.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.Adapters.Facebook.FacebookEvents.FacebookQuickReply.Title
member.summary: Gets or sets the title of the reply. Required if content_type is "text".
member.value: The title of the reply. 20 character limit.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.Adapters.Facebook.FacebookEvents.FacebookQuickReply.Payload
member.summary: Gets or sets the payload of the reply. May be set to an empty string if the property is set.
member.value: The payload. Can be either a string or a long.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.Adapters.Facebook.FacebookEvents.FacebookQuickReply.ImageUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets the optional URL of the image to display on the quick reply button for text quick replies. Required if the property is empty.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.Adapters.Facebook.FacebookHelper.GenerateTypingActivity(System.String)
member.summary: Generates an activity that displays a typing indicator.
member.param: The ID of the recipient of the message.
member.returns: An activity with sender_action equal to "typing_on".

member.name: T:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.Adapters.Facebook.FacebookMessage
member.summary: Represents information associated with a Facebook webhook event. For more information, see the Facebook [Webhook Events Reference](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/messenger-platform/reference/webhook-events).

member.name: M:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.Adapters.Facebook.FacebookMessage.#ctor(System.String,Microsoft.Bot.Builder.Adapters.Facebook.Message,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: Contents of the recipient ID field.
Contents of the message field.
The type of webhook event. For more information, see the Facebook [List of Webhook Events](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/messenger-platform/reference/webhook-events#event_list).
The optional message tag string. See https://developers.facebook.com/docs/messenger-platform/send-messages/message-tags.
The optional notification type: REGULAR (default value), SILENT_PUSH, NO_PUSH.
The persona ID.
Message state to display to the user: typing_on, typing_off, mark_seen. Cannot be sent with 'message'. When used, 'recipient' should be the only other property set in the request.
The sender ID.

member.summary: Gets or sets the value of the postback property.
